byline.original: By RICHARD CHRISTIANSEN and VANESSA HOLDEN

abstract: The founder of Chandelier Creative and former senior Vice President of West Elm document the first stop on their three-week trip around the world searching for creative inspiration.

headline.main: Richard Christiansen and Vanessa Holden’s Trip to Morocco

snippet: The founder of Chandelier Creative and former senior Vice President of West Elm document the first stop on their three-week trip around the world searching for creative inspiration.
